Component.label: Barcode
Component.OutputDescription: The format of the scanned QR Code/Barcode. (e.g. EAN 13)
The value of the scanned QR Code/Barcode. (e.g 9780128001080)
The value type of the scanned QR Code/Barcode (e.g. Text)
Component.Description:
The Barcode operation scans a QR Code or a Barcode and provides the readed information as output.

This component uses the BarcodeScanner PhoneGap plugin to interact with the device.

More information about the plugin are available here: https://github.com/webratio/phonegap-plugin-barcodescanner

.
